Let say that we reach just soft cap, 175 ETH, calculation is following:  your amount of token = your contribution (0.3 ETH) / raised capital (175 ETH) * available tokens for all investors (900000) = 1500 CCOPY tokens  It depends also at which stage you have invested, not same if you invest today and get 20% or if you invest last day without bonus.

Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: I saw already 2-3 ICOs with the same idea, copying crypto traders. What's the difference between them and your project?

Author: manjak87
Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: That is a good question. We have following things different: - we are tracking ethereum addresses, so investors dont even know we are tracking them. And we let the other people copy them. Other platforms have to get first sucessful investors registered on their platform and then other people who want to copy them. So pretty much to do. - we have possibility for copying ICO participation too. There is no platform that allow you to do something like that, because they work with exchange APIs, where you dont have info when someone participate in an ICO - we are tracking already almost 1 milion investors. Can you imagine how much effort our competitors have to put in order to find and motivate these investors to register on their platform?

Author: Crumple Cat
Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: Hey,  Once again, I'm convinced that all genius is simple. You guys are offering a tool that I believe can be an excellent mechanism against scam. But in that case, if the top investors will really invest mainly in successful projects (although they are therefore successful), and all who aren't in the top 1000 investors will copy their solutions. Voila. Scammers will remain without investments This is certainly an idealistic picture, but there can be a move to this. But of course I also want to say that isn't always correct to blindly repeat, even the most successful investors. As a result, such a top could abuse its position. And other excellent projects in which it would not have invested this top would be in a difficult situation.  Well, you can count on the support by Crumple Cat As in the bounty campaign and without it. But the first thing I would like to advise you is to improve your site, in particular the interface. Now it looks very poor.  So, I already made a tweet about your concept and I'm looking forward to seeing you on Twitter! https://twitter.com/iamcrumplecat/status/924351608019935232

Author: biy
Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: Thanks! Look, investors don't need to participate. We are tracking them all, what they are doing with their ethereum accounts. Other users can just copy top 100 investors at once. It will not be as much successful as copying one particular great investor, but it will be safe because at one moment one of them will not doing that well and other will. In general they together make great profit with a minimum risk.  We are first startup that is doing something like that. Other similar startups have only registered investors and there comes your question "But Why Will investors participate in this?". It is a huge effort to have them registered on your platform. We are tracking, on the other hand, at the moment over 600.000 investors which don't know we are doing that and they can come and register in order to get extra profit, but they don't have to.

Author: manjak87
Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: Hi Nicolas, here is Igor Manjencic, CEO of CryptoCopy. I have never seen your project before. When I saw your post here I was worried that my team didn't research market well and that there is another similar idea but when I saw your project description it was enough for me to realise that you just wanted here to promote your project, which is such a miserable idea, sorry    First, regarding name, Kryptopy and CryptoCopy are different names, it is not about spelling, it is different name. Second, you describe your project as "Kryptopy - 1st mainstream blockchain social network." and we "CryptoCopy - copy successful cryptocurrency investors".  So, it seems that you guys have some kind of intellectual property problem with steem.io and thousand of other social network application based on a blockchain. I wish you good luck. anyway.

Author: Krezz2017
Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: The idea is certainly interesting - to copy the actions of successful investors. But, the question arises. And how are you going to do this? And this successful investor will not merge his capial? And then when copying can the same happen to Bob?

Author: biy
Title: [ICO] ██ CRYPTOCOPY - PLATFORM - COPY SUCCESSFUL CRYPTOCURRENCY INVESTORS ██
Body: I am not sure if I understood correctly question but I will try to answer. When original investor deposit more ethers on account, on Bob's account will that, of course, not happen. If original investor sends some ethereums to other account that wouldn't also affect Bob's account. Exception here is if original investor sends ethers to some ICO crowdsale contract, in that case if we have whitelisted that particular ICO, action will be performed on Bob's account too.  Did I answer on your question? If you have any more question, feel free to post.

So, supply for first one will not be changed and investors will always receive same percentage of profit (take a look at investing schema).
